com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.local

Class LocalCassandraFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.local.LocalCassandraFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CassandraFactory

    public final class LocalCassandraFactory
extends Object
implements CassandraFactory
    CassandraFactory to create a local Cassandra.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Dmytro Nosan
    See Also:
    LocalCassandraFactoryBuilder

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Cassandra create()
      Creates a new configured Cassandra.
      ArtifactFactory getArtifactFactory()
      ArtifactFactory that creates a Artifact.
      URL getConfigurationFile()
      Cassandra configuration file (cassandra.yaml).
      List<String> getJvmOptions()
      JVM options that should be associated with Cassandra.
      URL getLogbackFile()
      Cassandra logging file (logback.xml).
      URL getRackFile()
      The GossipingPropertyFileSnitch, Ec2Snitch, and Ec2MultiRegionSnitch use the cassandra-rackdc.properties configuration file to determine which datacenters and racks nodes belong to.
      URL getTopologyFile()
      The PropertyFileSnitch uses the cassandra-topology.properties for datacenters and rack names and to determine network topology so that requests are routed efficiently and allows the database to distribute replicas evenly.
      Version getVersion()
      Version of the Cassandra.
      Path getWorkingDirectory()
      Cassandra directory.

      • getTopologyFile

        @Nullable
public URL getTopologyFile()
        The PropertyFileSnitch uses the cassandra-topology.properties for datacenters and rack names and to determine network topology so that requests are routed efficiently and allows the database to distribute replicas evenly.
        Returns:
        the value of topologyFile attribute

      • getWorkingDirectory

        @Nullable
public Path getWorkingDirectory()
        Cassandra directory. This directory keeps data/logs, and other Cassandra's files.

        By default tmp.dir is used.

        Note! Temporary directory will be deleted at the end. If you want to keep the data/logs between launches, you should specify the real directory.

        Returns:
        The value of the workingDirectory attribute

      • setWorkingDirectory
